numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The percentage of colored players is higher than the percentage of colored coaches.
2. The percentage of colored people varies across sports.
3. The NBA has the highest percentage of diversity.
4. The percentage of diversity in the NBA is 83%.
5. The MLB has the lowest percentage of diversity.
6. The percentage of diversity in the MLB is 40%.
7. I wonder why the percentage of diversity is not consistent across sports.
8. I wonder why there are more colored players than colored coaches.
9. More players come and go than coaches.
10. However, I still have this question.
11. The title is "Diversity in the Game".
